meta_title_home: Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung | Precise real estate valuation & consulting
meta_description_home: Since 1995 Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung has provided independent valuations, consulting and project management. We prepare traffic-value appraisals, conduct building condition assessments and guide your project across Central Switzerland, Zurich and Western Switzerland. Precision, discretion and experience.
meta_description_person_a: Profile of Dominik Planzer, Dipl. Arch. ETH/SIA and real estate valuer at Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung.
meta_description_person_b: Profile of Françoise Ellenberger, Dipl. Arch. ETH/SIA and real estate valuer at Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung.
hero_tagline: Since 1995 – independent valuations, consulting and project management
value_1_desc: Detailed analyses and well-founded valuations as a basis for decision-making.
value_2_desc: Objective and impartial reports, free from conflicts of interest.
value_3_desc: Absolute protection of your sensitive data and preservation of your privacy.
value_4_desc: Experience since 1995 as architects and real estate valuers.

services.title: Market Value Appraisals
services.description: We determine the market value of your property according to national and international standards. Ideal for purchases, sales, financing, or inheritances.

services.title: Building Condition Assessments
services.description: Detailed analysis of the building fabric to identify defects and plan renovation measures, including cost estimates.

services.title: Project Management (New Build/Refurbishment)
services.description: We oversee your construction project from planning to completion, ensuring quality and monitoring costs and deadlines.

services.title: Transaction Advisory
services.description: Comprehensive support for purchase, sale, or gift processes, from due diligence to the closing of the contract.

work_1_desc: Masterplan and competition for 100 rental and owner-occupied apartments.
work_2_desc: Owner-side project management for refurbishing a 70-year-old home.
work_3_desc: New office and laboratory building certified Minergie-P-Eco and SNBS Platinum.
work_4_desc: Library redesign with zoned concept and full project leadership.

process_steps.title: Contact & Needs Analysis
process_steps.description: You describe your request. We clarify the objective, scope, and specific requirements of your assignment.

process_steps.title: Site Inspection & Data Collection
process_steps.description: We conduct a thorough on-site inspection and gather all relevant documents and market data.

process_steps.title: Analysis & Valuation
process_steps.description: Our experts analyze the collected information and apply the appropriate valuation methods.

process_steps.title: Report & Debriefing
process_steps.description: You receive a clear, comprehensive report. We discuss the results with you and answer your questions.

credentials_methods_desc: Hedonic modelling, DCF (Discounted Cash Flow), comparable sales approach, and other methods according to international standards.
credentials_regions_desc: Zurich, Central Switzerland, Western Switzerland, and by request.
credentials_partners_desc: We regularly collaborate with leading banks, insurance companies, and pension funds.
team_a_title: MSc Arch ETH/SIA, Real Estate Valuer
team_b_title: MSc Arch ETH/SIA, Real Estate Valuer

faq.title: How long does a valuation take?
faq.description: A standard market value appraisal for a residential property typically takes 2-3 weeks from inspection to completion.

faq.title: What does a report cost?
faq.description: The cost depends on the property type, complexity, and scope of the assignment. We would be happy to provide a transparent offer.

faq.title: Are your reports accepted by banks?
faq.description: Yes, our reports comply with the standards of most Swiss financial institutions and are widely accepted.

contact_intro: We look forward to your inquiry for a non-binding initial consultation.
meta_description_services: Learn more about our services – traffic-value appraisals, building-condition assessments, project management and transaction advisory.
meta_description_projects: Explore selected projects and references – from residential buildings and commercial properties to new developments.
meta_description_about: Discover the history and values of Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung.
meta_description_contact: Get in touch with us for a non-binding initial consultation.
about_intro: Since 1995, Immobilien Schätzung + Beratung has provided independent valuations, consulting and project management for private and institutional clients. Our values – precision, independence, discretion and experience – guide every assignment. Founded by Dominik Planzer and Françoise Ellenberger, we combine decades of architectural experience with certified valuation expertise.

person_a.name: Dominik Planzer
person_a.title: MSc Arch ETH/SIA, Real Estate Valuer
person_a.bio: An analytical thinker with a passion for architecture and solid, data-driven valuations. His focus is on complex commercial properties and portfolios.
person_a.motivation: 'Architecture is the art of shaping space. Valuation is the science of determining its worth. I find it fascinating how the two complement each other to define a property holistically. In my free time, I enjoy sailing on Lake Zurich and the precision of target shooting.'

timeline.title: Senior Valuer, Major Bank
timeline.description: Focus on commercial real estate financing.

timeline.title: Architect & Project Manager, Renowned Architectural Firm
timeline.description: Planning and execution of large-scale projects.

person_b.name: Françoise Ellenberger
person_b.title: MSc Arch ETH/SIA, Real Estate Valuer
person_b.bio: Combines design sensibility with methodical valuation competence. Her strength lies in residential properties and advising on inheritances and donations.
person_b.motivation: 'Every property tells a story—about the people who lived in it and its structural evolution. Assigning an objective value to these stories is a task of great responsibility. I find balance hiking in the Alps and engaging with modern art.'

timeline.title: Real Estate Valuer, Consulting Firm
timeline.description: Specialization in residential and special-purpose properties.

work_5_desc: Market valuation for a lakeside property as the basis for an estate settlement.
work_6_desc: Feasibility and market analysis for a new business park.
work_7_desc: Transaction advisory for an international buyer in Western Switzerland.
work_8_desc: Condition assessment for a listed townhouse in Bern.
